channel.title: Monsterhearts 2: Welcome to Camp Monsterhearts! (Thursdays in August)
channel.description:
This is for a four-session run of *Monsterhearts 2* , scheduled for 8pm US Eastern time on Thursdays in August. Tone is aiming for classic angsty teen Monsterhearts with a splash of classic teen summer camp horror. No prior familiarity with the rules is expected. I will send out a group email about a week before the first session to confirm everyone’s intent to play and to provide set-up and invitation details. A fourth seat is being held for Ferret of the Gauntlet community.
*Welcome to Camp Winding Woods! Situated along beautiful Woodpecker Lake in idyllic northern Minnesota, our mission is to help young people like yourselves learn important teamwork, leadership, and problem solving skills in a safe and fun outdoor setting, far away from the distractions of WiFi or cell service, where you'll meet lifelong friends and make memories that last a lifetime! Whether you're new to camp or have been coming for ages, we've got a great line-up of activities planned for you this year, from sporty to artsy! Just remember to follow camp rules at all times, and don't let those stories about virgin-eating werewolves in the woods get to you! So--who's ready for summer!? I can't HEEEEEEEAR you! That's more like it!*
Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mdi84tfBJ-GSMAJLxPv
Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mdi8MnO-lBxc259HknL
Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mdi8eZ8HG7cOzYc-TWO
Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Mdi8qfSO5LSCwo74g0h
CW: Sexual content
**System :** Monsterhearts 2
**Duration :** Four 3-hour sessions
**Breaks :** Short breaks at the top of each hour-ish (5-10 minutes)
**Venue :** Zoom
**Recording :** With permission from all participants before and after the session
**Attendance :** Attendance to all sessions is strongly preferred but not required.
**Safety :** Lines & Veils, X-card, Open Door Policy. Tools can be modified throughout the game to suit player needs.
This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the calendar posting and send me a heads-up. All-access sign-up opens on July 6, 5:00pm US Central time.
